billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

title: Authorizes the head of any correctional institution to charge taxes on sales of commissaries and canteens
summary: Directs the head of any correctional institution to charge taxes on sales of items sold in commissaries and canteens; such tax receipts to be allocated to localities otherwise prescribed by law.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to charging taxes on sales of commissaries and canteens
